metadata.title: Thursday, 11th December, 2014
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    whether some parts of the country will experience a drought during the 2014/2015 rainy season;
(b)    if so, which parts of the country are expected to experience drought; and
(c)    what measures the Government is taking to sensitise the citizens to take precautions to mitigate their suffering due to drought.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    whether the Government has any plans to provide bursaries to students at private universities and colleges; and
(b)    if so, when the plans will be implemented.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    whether feasibility studies for the upgrading of the Luwingu-Nsombo-Chaba-Chilubi road have been carried out;
(b)    if so, when tenders for the construction of the road will be advertised;
(c)    what the nature of road works to be done is; and
(d)    whether any maintenance works on the road will be carried out before 31st December, 2014.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development
parts: (a)    why there is a huge backlog of domestic electricity consumers waiting to be connected to power lines in Solwezi District; and
(b)    whether there are priority areas in the District in terms of providing electricity and, if so, what the priority areas are.
